name: Verify invalid registration by the user due to invalid first name

steps.name: Given the user is on the sign up page
When the invalid input is given in the first name "O'Connor-Smith-Is-Very-Very-Very-Very-LongFirstName" field
Then create an account button is clicked
And the invalid first name  message should be displayed to the user properly
